meanings.sent1: The sky looked streakier as the sun set, with colorful streaks of pink and orange.
meanings.sent2: Her painting became streakier as she added more colors to the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The zebra thought it was funny to paint itself even streakier with black and white stripes.
meanings.sent4: The streakier clouds resembled long brushstrokes across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The streakier pattern on the butterfly's wings made it stand out among the flowers.

meanings.sent1: The new shampoo made her hair streakier, with strands of different shades.
meanings.sent2: The old window cleaner left streakier marks on the glass than the new one.
meanings.sent3: The streakier appearance of the ice cream made it seem like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her streakier handwriting was hard to read, with lines going in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The streakier marble countertop added a unique touch to the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The streakier wood grain gave the table a rustic look.
meanings.sent2: The sky became streakier as the storm clouds rolled in.
meanings.sent3: The streakier pattern on the snake's skin made it blend in with the tree bark.
meanings.sent4: Her streakier style of painting was inspired by the abstract art movement.
meanings.sent5: The streakier appearance of the rock formation hinted at its volcanic origins.
